Items.Title: Oversight - Meeting the Needs of  Students with Disabilities in the COVID Era.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Meeting the Needs of  Students with Disabilities in the COVID Era.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.7381/A.8283, to require any public school located in a city with a population of one million or more to provide a remote learning option when community transmission of COVID-19 is at a substantial or high level.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Require any public school located in a city with a population of one million or more to provide a remote learning option when community transmission of COVID-19 is at a substantial or high level. (S.7381/A.8283)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.7381/A.8283, to require any public school located in a city with a population of one million or more to provide a remote learning option when community transmission of COVID-19 is at a substantial or high level.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Require any public school located in a city with a population of one million or more to provide a remote learning option when community transmission of COVID-19 is at a substantial or high level. (S.7381/A.8283)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rivera and Rosenthal

Items.Title: Oversight - Meeting the Needs of  Students with Disabilities in the COVID Era.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
